name: azora-os
description: The World's First Constitutional AI Operating System

scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:api-gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:mint" "npm run dev:lms" "npm run dev:forge" "npm run dev:nexus" "npm run dev:education" "npm run dev:payments"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:services
scripts.test:all: npm run test:services && npm run test:frontend
scripts.db:migrate:all: concurrently "cd services/auth-service && npm run db:migrate" "cd services/mint-service && npm run db:migrate" "cd services/lms-service && npm run db:migrate" "cd services/forge-service && npm run db:migrate" "cd services/nexus-service && npm run db:migrate" "cd services/education-service && npm run db:migrate" "cd services/payments-service && npm run db:migrate"
scripts.db:generate:all: concurrently "cd services/auth-service && npm run db:generate" "cd services/mint-service && npm run db:generate" "cd services/forge-service && npm run db:generate" "cd services/lms-service && npm run db:generate" "cd services/nexus-service && npm run db:generate" "cd services/education-service && npm run db:generate" "cd services/payments-service && npm run db:generate"
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v database && docker-compose up -d database

author: Azora ES (Pty) Ltd
